title: Banana Almond Smoothie
summary: You can never have too many morn meal recipes, so give Bananan Almond Smoothie a try. This recipe makes 1 servings with 250 calories, 6g of protein, and 6g of fat each. For 87 cents per serving, this recipe covers 12% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 382 people have made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up spoonful of almond butter, regular milk, maple syrup, and a few other things to make it today. It is brought to you by Cookie and Kate. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 2 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. With a spoonacular score of 86%, this dish is great. Try Banana-Peach Almond Smoothie & the Secret to Making the Perfect Smoothie, Bananan Almond Smoothie, and Bananan Almond Smoothie for similar recipes.
